mdRecord.dcterms:title: Visitors at Home of Washington, Mount Vernon, Va.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Dillon, Luke C., 1836-1904
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Mounted photographic print by Luke C. Dillon - Home of Washington, Mount Vernon, VA - view of two gentlemen (left to right: Frank H. Astroth and Fred S. Bolte of St. Louis, Missouri) posing in front of the south porch, July 25, 1892. The handwritten date on the cardboard mount '7/26/92' is likely the day the photograph was purchased from Dillon's study. The Mount Vernon Register (guest book) shows the two men visited and signed the book on July 25th. Printed on the reverse is the following text: Orders for duplicates of Photographic Groups taken at Mount Vernon can be had by stating the day of the month and the number of the Groups. Luke C. Dillon, Photographer to Mount Vernon, Office at Pullman's Gallery, 935 Pa. Ave. P. O. Box 655, Washington City, D. C. Handwritten note - 'July 25 - 4 [group number]'
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
